author: ddewolf
msg: Updated testsuite to enhance the Security Mapping Test.
- Include the test in the test configuration
- Allow configuration of what roles to use for the tests

author: ddewolf
msg: Handling null parameters properly.  Previously, null values which were recieved through ?param=&param2= action requests were being converted to the string value "null" when converted to render parameters in subsequent render urls.  The proper behavior is to leave the value as an actual null value.

author: ddewolf
msg: Applied patch from Ken Weiner to treat render parameter values equal to "" the same as null values.

author: ddewolf
msg: - Adding details to the change log mentioning updates completed towards the next release.
- Updated the index to reflect our released version and our next release
- Mavenized the mirror.html which is used by the cgi to display the download page.  This allows for a consistant look and feel on the download page.
